did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Advocate Research and Education
Foundation/Advocate Experience records, 1978-1981
did.physdesc:
Correspondence, financial records,
registration files, topical seminar background material, "facilitator
information sheets," audio and video cassettes, slides.
did.repository:
Division of Rare and Manuscript
Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
The collection pertains chiefly to the
Advocate Experience, an EST-derived seminar for lesbians and gays founded by
David B. Goodstein. The contains various materials from 1978 to 1981 of the
Advocate Research and Education Foundation Board and the Advocate Experience
staff, and manuals pertaining to the Advocate Experience and the Outrageous
Experience (a seminar for instructors).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p:
In the 1970s, David B. Goodstein created the Advocate Research and
Education Foundation, a non-profit structure through which to conduct the
"Advocate Experience." Initially the Experience was a one-weekend seminar
similar to Werner Erhard's EST, only targeted at a gay audience. The foundation
was eventually combined with the Mariposa Education and Research
Foundation.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p:
The collection is divided into four series: Advocate Research and
Education Foundation and Advocate Experience Correspondence and Memos' and
Alphabetical Subject File; Facilitator Information Sheets; and an Audio and
Video cassette series. The Facilitator Information Sheets
are restricted until 2041.

p.emph:
Boxes ten, eleven, and
twelve (10, 11, 12) are restricted until 2041.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p:
Advocate Research and Education Foundation/Advocate Experience
Records, #7310. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University
Library.

Series IV. Advocate Experience Audio and Video Cassettes
and Slides

Sixteen videotapes
pertaining to the Advocate Experience, including training sessions, graduates
sharing the experience, and David B. Goodstein presentations

Twenty
audiocassettes pertaining to the Advocate Experience, including seminar
sessions, Opening Space session, disco music, and "Ethel Merman
Single"

Approximately 90
slides pertaining to the Advocate Experience
